name: tavi.vim
summary: Syntax highlighting for the WikkiTikkiTavi ('Tavi) wiki engine
description:
Syntax highlighting for the WikkiTikkiTavi ('Tavi) wiki engine.

Homepage: http://tavi.sourceforge.net/
install_details: Copy tavi.vim to $VIMRUNTIME/syntax. 'set filetype=tavi' to turn the highlighting on. See 'help 43.2' if you want to detect tavi pages automatically.
